CustomField.description: For visualizing grant locations on a map, if the Account Billing Address should not be used, specify the information to be mapper here. You may enter a partial address (i.e., only country, or only city) if that's all you know.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For visualizing grant locations on a map, if the Account Billing Address should not be used, specify the information to be mapper here. You may enter a partial address (i.e., only country, or only city) if that's all you know.
CustomField.label: Mapping Override Address
